item.description:
Slow Chanting Service (Beginners Chanting):

During our afternoon Service on Sundays, we chant portions of the Lotus Sutra and also chant the Odaimoku (Namu Myoho Renge Kyo) at a slow pace. This is perfect for those just learning how to chant in the traditional Shindoku style. Of course, some of us who have been chanting for a while may also enjoy the slower pace in this service. The service will be a shortened version of the morning service and will last about 45 min. - 1 hour. Service begins 15 minutes after scheduled time. We broadcast some of our events. These broadcast our done on Google+ by invitation only, so please see our webpage for details on how to get on the invite list.

www.newenglandbuddhist.org

Â
item.name: Slow Chanting Service (Beginners)
